scripts.dev: cross-env VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Local® Dev™ Mode" vite
scripts.build: vue-tsc && env && vite build && call build\before_build.bat&& electron-builder --config build\ultra-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat
scripts.build:ultra: cross-env-shell VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Intel® Core™ Ultra Series 2" "call build\ultra_before_build.bat&&vue-tsc && vite build && electron-builder --config build\ultra-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat"
scripts.dir:ultra: call build\ultra_before_build.bat&&vue-tsc && vite build && electron-builder --dir --config build\ultra-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat
scripts.build:arc: cross-env-shell VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Intel® Arc™" "vue-tsc && vite build && call build\arc_before_build.bat&& electron-builder --config build\arc-build.json&&call build\after_build.bat"
